notice.ch: 須先修普化；選修「生科職涯學分學程」之學生請向授課老師拿密碼卡選課

remark.ch: 須先修普化；選修「生科職涯學分學程」之學生請向授課老師拿密碼卡選課

goal.ch:
俾使學生了解並熟悉:
[1]有機化合物之IUPAC命名系統
[2]有機反應發生的原理
[3]反應機構的推導
[4]化合物光譜鑑定法
goal.en:
This course is aim to make students:
[1] Learn and know how to name organic compounds by following IUPAC rules.
[2] Understand the basic principle of the reason that an organic reaction can occur.
[3] Learn how to deduce the reasonable mechanism for a specific organic reaction.
[4] Learn how to use spectroscopic techniques to identify the chemical structures of organic compounds.

outline.ch: “敘述有機化合物之命名,物理-化學特性,認識有機化學反應進行方式以及如何利用光譜技術鑑定有機化合物之分子結構.“
outline.en:
The scope of this course covers:
[1] Introduction of the nomenclature of various classes of otganic compounds.
[2] Describing the physical and chemical properties of various organic compounds.
[3] Gaining knowledge about the mechanism of organic reactions.
[4] Introduction of the spectroscopic techniques for the identification of organic compounds.

ch.competencies: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力

en.competencies: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

系所:限理學院學士班、輔系-化學學系、雙主修-化學學系。年級:限非一年級。
